altTitles.ja: 私、異世界で奴隷にされちゃいました（泣）しかもご主人様は性格の悪いエルフの女王様（でも超美人←ここ大事）無能すぎて罵られまくるけど同僚のオークが癒やし系だし里のエルフは可愛いし結構楽しんでる私です。

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi, Isekai de Dorei ni Sarechaimashita (naku). Shikamo Goshujin-sama ha Seikaku no Warui Erufu no Jou'ou-sama (demo Chou-Bijin ← Koko Daiji) Munou sugite Nonoshiraremakuru kedo Douryou no Orc ga Iyashi-kei dashi Sato no Erufu ha Kawaii shi Kekkou Tanoshinderu Watashi desu.

altTitles.en: I was made a slave in a different world (I cry) and my master is an elf queen with a bad personality! (But she is very beautiful, and that's what's important.) I'm having a lot of fun, because my co-worker, an orc, is very healing, and the elves in my village are cute.

I Became a Slave in Another World (sob) and to make matters worse, My Master is a Black-Hearted Elf Queen! (But She’s Super Hot. (note: v. impt.)) I’m Pretty Useless, So I’m Getting Barked At Left, Right, and Centre, but the ORC I’m rooming with is full of good vibes, and the ELF in the Village is pretty cute too, so on the whole, I have to say that I’m actually quite enjoying myself here.

altTitles.hu: Engem Egy Másik Világban Rabszolgává Tettek (Brühühü) Ráadásul A Gazdám Egy Rossz Természetű Elf Királynő (De Nagyon Szép ← Ez Fontos) Bár Folyton Szid, Mert Haszontalan Vagyok, Az Ork Kollégám Megnyugtató És A Falu Elfjei Aranyosak, Így Egész Jól Érzem Magam.

description.en: I'm Teru! Just your wee lil' horny high school girl who's trying to become a mangaka! One day, while I was lost in my sexual fantasies, I got hit by a truck and was reincarnated into an isekai! Though I became a slave of the beautiful elf queen, Sirius, I've got a wholesome orc as my roommate, and there's cute elves all around, so I have to say I'm having a pretty time!
description.ja:
漫画家を目指すちょっぴりエッチな女子高生・テル。
ある日、エロ妄想をしていたらトラックに轢かれて異世界に転生してしまった！
異世界で出会った美しいエルフの女王・シリウスの奴隷にされたけれど、癒やし系の同僚オークや可愛いエルフたちのおかげで、結構楽しく暮らしています
